title: 2005 Western Dump Trailer with Hydraulic Lift
item_description:
Dump Trailer with Hydraulic Lift

  • VIN: 1W9D508185C166954
  • License: 4HC4082
    • Expiration Date: 5/31/2026
  • Heavy-duty, single-axel, all steel
  • Dimension of Box:
    • Width: 5’
    • Length: 8’
    • Depth: 18”
  • Includes removable side-mounted winch lift. 
  • New tires (September 2024)
  • New Hydraulic Power Unit (October 2024)

Note: Certificate of Title, and Transfer Form will be mailed within 1 week after the removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of registration, transfer, taxes, and fees due to the DMV.
